name: PR Build (No AI)

on:
  pull_request:

permissions:
  contents: read

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          distribution: temurin
          java-version: 17

      - name: Make gradlew executable
        run: chmod +x ./gradlew

      - name: Run Gradle build
        run: ./gradlew assembleDebug
